title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: A story about the American dream and the disillusionment that comes with it.
review: A classic novel that explores themes of wealth, love, and the American dream. The characters are well-developed and the writing is beautiful. Highly recommend!
